title: # 295 - Nikki Glaser & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Nikki Glaser to talk about social media, Amy Schumer, success, sex, dating, and anorexia.

Check out Nikki's show on Sirius xm "You up?" on ch 95

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast
